synopsis.text: To atone for their colossal mistake, three Yakuza members find themselves at a crossroads: a grim end or an unexpected transformation into J-Pop idols. Choosing the latter, they embark on a grueling journey to Thailand for a life-altering surgery and rigorous idol training. After a year of relentless hard work, they emerge as Airi, Chika, and Mari, the dazzling new faces of the amateur idol group, The Goku Dolls. Despite their initial reluctance, the trio manages to keep their yakuza spirit alive while embracing their new identities. With the help of the legendary manager Mandarin Kinoshita, they strive to unleash their inner charm and climb the ladder of success in the cutthroat world of J-Pop. As their popularity soars, the three must navigate the complexities of their new lives, marking the beginning of a unique and captivating tragedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
